localize.title: VIRAL MOMENT。参议院在弹劾听证会上对特朗普律师大笑不止
localize.description: VIRAL MOMENT。特朗普律师在费城办公室要求取证时，参议院爆发了笑声。"我不知道你为什么笑！"

WandaVision 1x06 full episode shot-by-shot analysis! Who is “Pietro,” actually? Head to http://upstart.com/newrockstars to find out how you can lower your monthly payments today.

SPOILERS ahead!

WandaVision’s sixth episode, “All-New Halloween Spooktacular” set in the 2000s “Malcolm in the Middle” era, shows the Maximoff family on Halloween night as Wanda’s Westview hex expands, Pietro’s dark nature comes out, Agnes brings up more questions, and the darkest commercial yet has everyone wondering how these correspond to Wanda’s secret past. Erik Voss breaks down all the Easter Eggs you missed, including the creepy Halloween stalkers in the background behind Wanda, Pietro’s subtle gestures hinting at his dark agenda, and the deeper meaning of the Yo-Magic commercial. Does Wanda’s hex create mutants? How does the Marvel Multiverse work? Is Pietro actually Mephisto?

About New Rockstars:
Hey everyone, welcome to the official New Rockstars YouTube channel! We cover what the internet cares about. From Marvel to the Walking Dead, Rick and Morty to Stranger Things, James Bond to Star Wars, and more. We got you covered in every movie and television show you might love! Don’t forget to subscribe and enable all push notifications so you never miss a review, breakdown, or theory.

localize.description:
万达视界1x06全集镜头分析! "皮特罗 "到底是谁？前往http://upstart.com/newrockstars，了解今天如何降低月供。

前面有剧透!

万达视讯第六集《全新万圣节大闹天宫》以2000年的 "马尔科姆在中间 "时代为背景，在万圣节之夜，马克西莫夫一家在万达的西景区六合彩资料大全扩大，皮特罗的黑暗本性显现，艾格尼丝带来了更多的疑问，而最黑暗的广告也让大家好奇这些与万达的秘密过去如何对应。Erik Voss为大家剖析了所有你错过的复活节彩蛋，包括万达身后背景中令人毛骨悚然的万圣节跟踪者，Pietro微妙的手势暗示了他的黑暗计划，以及Yo-Magic广告的深层含义。旺达的魔咒是否会制造变种人？漫威多元宇宙是如何运作的？皮特罗其实是墨菲斯托吗？

localize.title: WANDAVISION EPISODE 6 BREAKDOWN! 復活節彩蛋和你錯過的細節! (1x06 萬聖節篇)
localize.description:
萬達視界1x06全集鏡頭分析! "皮特羅 "到底是誰？前往http://upstart.com/newrockstars，瞭解今天如何降低月供。

前面有劇透!

如果你有興趣成爲Social Bluebook和New Rockstars的新壞蛋社交媒體經理，請看下面的工作描述。
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-w34VcOueRNcdUw-9nl_zPXuRNOa-1v9uqnknGKjUXQ/edit?usp=sharing

看看我們可愛的商品吧！http://www.newrockstarsmerch.com
訂閱: http://bit.ly/SubNewRockstars | 啓用所有推送通知 🔔。
觀看最新視頻：https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4xEo4XxrSJbbjsGMSWDN62z8XB6QzHFy

萬達視訊第六集《全新萬聖節大鬧天宮》以2000年的 "馬爾科姆在中間 "時代爲背景，在萬聖節之夜，馬克西莫夫一家在萬達的西景區六合彩資料大全擴大，皮特羅的黑暗本性顯現，艾格尼絲帶來了更多的疑問，而最黑暗的廣告也讓大家好奇這些與萬達的祕密過去如何對應。Erik Voss爲大家剖析了所有你錯過的復活節彩蛋，包括萬達身後背景中令人毛骨悚然的萬聖節跟蹤者，Pietro微妙的手勢暗示了他的黑暗計劃，以及Yo-Magic廣告的深層含義。旺達的魔咒是否會製造變種人？漫威多元宇宙是如何運作的？皮特羅其實是墨菲斯托嗎？
